name: Pokemon: Real or Markov
description:
Guess which names are the real pokemon. Don't be fooled by Markov chain generated fake pokemon names.

For a recent project, I wrote a Markov Chain based Pokemon name generator which is suprisingly effective. The generator was originally written for my 7DRL project, MonsteRL

In Pokemon: Real or Markov you will be presented with 10 questions. In each question you'll have to pick the real Pokemon name out of 2 choices.

In the regular game you'll get handpicked real and Markov options for a consistent experience. I recommend you play it first.

In the Bonus Round, real Pokemon names are picked at random and Markov names are generated on the fly. Different every time!

Pokemon and real Pokemon names belong to Nintendo/Game Freak/The Pokemon Company. Pls don't sue.
